name: MoveProjectCard
description:
Move a project card to a different position.

Use this tool to move a card in a GitHub project to a different position within a column. This is helpful when reorganizing tasks or priorities in project management.

parameters.name: card_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the card to be moved within the project.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the card.

parameters.name: card_position
parameters.description: Specify where to place the card within the column: 'top', 'bottom', or 'after:<card_id>'.

value_schema.description: The position of the card in a column. Can be one of: `top`, `bottom`, or `after:<card_id>` to place after the specified card.

parameters.name: destination_column_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the column to which the card should be moved.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the column the card should be moved to

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the card.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the card.

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the column the card should be moved to

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the column the card should be moved to

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position of the card in a column. Can be one of: `top`, `bottom`, or `after:<card_id>` to place after the specified card.

value_schema.description: The position of the card in a column. Can be one of: `top`, `bottom`, or `after:<card_id>` to place after the specified card.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
